attributes.action: Mr Cameron should discard the results of the EU vote for greater good of the UK
attributes.additional_details: More than one million leave voters now regret their decision during the EU referendum (according to the independent) and that number is rising by the second.This means that the soon the majority of voters in the UK would be in favour of remaining in the EU
attributes.background: It is quickly and painfully become obvious of the many destabilisation effects of Brexit to the UK and its European and global partners.The results of the referendum are not legally binding for the government and therefore they should be overturned ASAP to avoid further damage to the UK
